refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: btclsh is a Tcl-based interactive shell for BRL-CAD. It provides command-line editing, command history, and scripting capabilities. It is particularly suited for text-based interactive scripting and automation in BRL-CAD environments.
Unlike bwish, btclsh does not require a graphical interface and can be used in environments without a display server.

listitem.para: Executes the provided Tcl script file and exits.
